mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.link AS "link", a.data_type AS "dataType", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.title AS "title", a.content_html AS "contentHtml", a.content AS "content", a.image AS "image", a.keywords AS "keywords", a.tags AS "tags", a.description AS "description", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.status AS "status", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u4.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_contribute( id, link, data_type, user_id, title, content_html, content, image, keywords, tags, description, create_date, update_by, update_date, status, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{link}, #{dataType}, #{user.id}, #{title}, #{contentHtml}, #{content}, #{image}, #{keywords}, #{tags}, #{description}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{status}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_contribute SET link = #{link}, data_type = #{dataType}, user_id = #{user.id}, title = #{title}, content_html = #{contentHtml}, content = #{content}, image = #{image}, keywords = #{keywords}, tags = #{tags}, description = #{description}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, status = #{status}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cms_contribute a
WHERE a.user_id = #{user.id} and a.del_flag='0'
and a.status !='0'
and a.status =#{status}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
